title: When Hitler Stole Pink Rabbit
description: It was a small piece of red enamel with a black hooked cross on it. "It's called a swastika," said Gunther, "all the Nazis have them".Anna is too busy with schoolwork and tobogganing to listen to the grown-ups' talk of Hitler. But one day she and her brother are rushed out of Germany in alarming secrecy, away from everything they know. Their father is wanted by the Nazis â€“ dead or alive. It is the start of a huge adventure, sometimes frightening, very often funny, and always, always exciting.Judith Kerr was born in Berlin and left Germany in 1993 to escape the Nazis. Her novels are based on her own experience.
author: Judith Kerr
